unnormalised: Arre yaar, solar rooftop subsidies are awesome! Heard my neighbour, Sharmaji in Bangalore, got a good deal. Rs. 50,000 back, unbelievable! Imagine, free electricity during Diwali! Need to check with Tata Power how many km of wiring are covered. Maybe I'll treat myself to a plate of biryani with the savings! Anyone else in Kerala using this? Onam bonus, eh?
